directions: In a large bowl, combine the confectioners sugar, vanilla wafers, walnuts, butter and orange juice. Mix well and shape into 1 inch round balls; allow to dry for 1 hour.
Place chocolate chips in top of double boiler. Stir frequently over medium heat until melted.
Dip balls into melted chocolate and place in decorative paper cups.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
title: Chocolate Covered Orange Balls
